    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method get the args for the creation of the ID related to the RM. After the Initialization of the Topic used to the Crash Manager, Main code checks for crash thanks to a state file. If a crash is detected, the RM starts the crash procedure. Else, it continue to the Topic and Queues initializations.
        Parameters:
        args -
